name: Research
description: Researching lore allows a character to delve into archives, libraries, or consult sages to learn information about a topic.
requirements: Access to a library, university, sage, or similar source of knowledge
At least 1 workweek of dedicated study
50 GP per day to cover materials, access fees, and related expenses
resolution: For each workweek of research, the character makes an Intelligence check with a bonus equal to the number of workweeks spent. The DM sets the DC based on the obscurity of the information.
notes: On a success, the character learns a piece of lore -- a bit of truth about a topic. On a failure, the character fails to uncover new information. The DM might reveal misleading or incomplete information on certain failures.
